categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Around 4 ABY, the Dulok Swamp on the moon of Endor was invaded and destroyed by forces of the Galactic Empire. The Imperials were looking for a site to build a shield generator bunker to protect their Death Star II battlestation in orbit of the moon. The Duloks, part of a tribe led by King Gorneesh, were no match for the invaders' weapons, nor for the subterranean creature awakened by the commotion: the Griagh. After their victory, the Imperial forces enslaved the Duloks.
